name: Alker, Appellant, v. The Philadelphia National Bank

judges: Before Stern, C. J., Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
parties: Alker, Appellant, v. The Philadelphia National Bank.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Judgment of Non Pros is affirmed on the Opinion of President Judge Frank Smith.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Lemuel B. Schofield, with him Edioin Hall, 2nd, and Harry J. Alker, Jr., for appellant.
Arthur Littleton, with him John R. McConnell and Morgan, Lewis & Bockius, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Alker, Appellant, v. The Philadelphia National Bank.
Argued November 24, 1952.
Before Stern, C. J., Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
Lemuel B. Schofield, with him Edioin Hall, 2nd, and Harry J. Alker, Jr., for appellant.
Arthur Littleton, with him John R. McConnell and Morgan, Lewis & Bockius, for appellee.
January 12, 1953:
